Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 63rd
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd due to a sick customer.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
